channel.title: Education on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Education on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Academic Field Studies
item.description:
What you can do

  • Field mapping exercises and labs
  • Research data collection and QA
  • Group collaboration and feedback

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Build projects in QGIS and keep cohorts aligned via QFieldCloud.

item.title: QField for Ecology and Environmental Science Education
item.description:
What you can do

  • Field labs and data collection
  • Observation and species recording
  • Group collaboration and reporting

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Build projects in QGIS and coordinate coursework with QFieldCloud.
